Description: Round-topped limestone funerary stela for Jacob; panel of Greek text beneath birds and confronted horses.
Curator's comments: cf. Badawy, Coptic Art and Archaeology (1978): 215, 221
Bibliographic references: Badawy 1978 / Coptic art and archaeology (3.210, p.219)
Beckwith 1963 / Coptic sculpture (no. 128 (p.56, pl.128)) (dated 7th or 8th century)
Fluck et al. 2015 / Egypt: Faith after the Pharaohs (p.238)
Exhibition history: 2015 1 April - 15 Sept. Berlin, Bode Museum, 'EIN GOTT - Abrahams Erben am Nil'
